Developer.Name: dopeytree
Developer.Bio: Mostly my own apps. A tinkering open-source developer & fellow Unraid user. All that matters is that you are making something you love, to the best of your ability, here & now.

App.Name: TVx
App.Description: A warm, nostalgic IPTV player bringing back the analog TV experience.

App.Name: Octofree
App.Description: Provides monitoring of Octopus energy FREE electricity sessions so you can make best use of them.
